about_the_game:
This a 「Text-Based Roguelike Adventure RPG」 that looks kinda crappy but hey, it might be really fun to play! You will start from nothing and then conquer the universe!

Story

You wake up from the forest,

You are barehanded,
You decide to conquer the universe,
This is not an easy road...

Gameplay

Obtain various resources through actions and battles, craft powerful weapons and equipment, build factories, and use alchemy to make powerful boosters!
Defeat all kinds of enemies from the forest to the entire universe! Face all kinds of random events! So as to become a strong human who can conquer the universe!
